What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello! LOVE CANVA! Not an issue but would it be possible to have a leggings template? trouser template etc? Perhaps a clothes templates...

Thank you so much :)

joe

Beskriv problemet ditt: Hey Canva.
I like Canva very much. But something I really miss is the following, namely a trifold brochure templates for concert events. Feel free to come up with more templates for this, also for festivals. Hope you can help me with this. I google all over the internet to find something.
Sincerely
Kjell Mersland, Premium user at Canva

What did you have a problem with?: Premium Templates

Describe your issue: My team member should not be allowed to buy premium images

Describe your issue: I made a channel on Rumble and need a template for "Rumble Backsplash".  Thank You!

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello, I would like to create a CV template. Can I also give this template to our interns etc. so that we have the same template from everyone? Or do I get into legal trouble? Inserting a logo costs a membership, right? I would like to make this template available to anyone interested free of charge. Thank you for your help <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to do a "family tree" with photos and captions...not necessarily with a tree motif. What template do you recommend?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: When I use a template and then attempt to edit the template, by adding my own info, the template complete distorts, making the template out of sync, not lined up, and useless. This has not always been an issue, I do not know how to fix it. As of now, I can not use any Canva templates without spending hours fixing the formatting to back to the way its supposed to look.
